summary: The Stone Curse Spell turns the victims flesh into stone.
descriptionHtml:
Basically I made this power for myself to have some fun, wearing the \"Medusa Armor\", you can find it here: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31229/
Thank you for the awesome work Zerofrost!

The Stone Curse Spell turns the victims flesh into stone.

You can find the spell book in a barrel next to the stone bridge of Riverwood, see the location screen shots for more details.

Stone Curse is a lesser power, which turns all non essential enemies into stone, essential characters will suffer a weaker effect. It is extrem powerful, so use it with caution ;)

This Mod should be compatible with all other mods out there.

--------------------------------------

Version History:

1.0 - Initial Release
author: nKalle
